# Portfolio Website Instructions

This is a modern portfolio website for Bhargav Pasupuleti, Software Developer / AI-ML Engineer.

## Project Structure
- React + Vite setup with Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion
- Dark theme with neon gradient accents (#40ffaa, #4079ff)
- Animated components including Prism background and GradientText

## Development Guidelines
- Use Framer Motion for all animations
- Maintain dark theme with gradient accent colors
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Follow responsive design principles
